Name: MahJong - Medieval Fantasy
About the game: MahJong - Medieval Fantasy is the perfect game for the casual player looking for fun and extensive gameplay. The goal of this game is to match open pairs of identical tiles and remove them from the board. The game is finished when all pairs of tiles have been removed from the board. Be careful, you have a limited time for each level, you have to be vigilant and fast. Game Features: - Highlight - Medieval Fantasy icons - Many levels
